text.div:
SHR AddressUseCS CodeSystem

How an address is used by the subject, for example, as a dwelling or as a mailing address.

name: SHR AddressUseCS CodeSystem
title: SHR AddressUseCS CodeSystem
publisher: The MITRE Corporation: Standard Health Record Collaborative
description: How an address is used by the subject, for example, as a dwelling or as a mailing address.

concept.display: The address at which a person dwells most frequently or maintains as his or her official premises.
concept.definition: The address at which a person dwells most frequently or maintains as his or her official premises.

concept.display: An address at which a person dwells on a secondary basis, for example, during vacation periods, when residing with other parent or relative, at boarding school, etc.
concept.definition: An address at which a person dwells on a secondary basis, for example, during vacation periods, when residing with other parent or relative, at boarding school, etc.

concept.display: An address temporarily used as a dwelling
concept.definition: An address temporarily used as a dwelling

concept.display: Address (residence, postal, or work address) that is no longer in use
concept.definition: Address (residence, postal, or work address) that is no longer in use

concept.display: Address is a postal address, such as a PO box
concept.definition: Address is a postal address, such as a PO box

concept.display: Address of place of business where the subject is employed
concept.definition: Address of place of business where the subject is employed
